caseTitle: Allah Ditta v. Deputy Postmaster General (Admn), Office of the Postmaster General, Northern Punjab Circle, Rawalpindi & another
tagline: (1). In case of proven fraud and misappropriation of public money, the delinquent cannot be exonerated. (2). The long term of service is no ground for conversion of punishment of dismissal into compulsory retirement. (3). The punishment was quite proportionate to the act of misconduct. (4). Mens rea refers to the intent of wrongdoing behind the crime knowingly/purposely.
